mapper.select: SELECT * FROM org ORDER BY regtime DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE org SET access = access +1 WHERE orgid=#{orgid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO org (orgid, orgname, regtime, contact, phone, address, logo, intro, isvalid) VALUES (#{orgid}, #{orgname}, #{regtime}, #{contact}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{logo}, #{intro}, #{isvalid})
